allowlistDestinationChain(uint64,bool).notice: Allows the owner to add or remove a destination chain allowed for CCIP

deleteCompany(uint256).notice: Owner can completely delete a company, freeing the owner's wallet

getEmployee(uint256).notice: Returns the information of an employee by ID

getEmployeesOfCompany(uint256).notice: Gets the IDs of employees of a company

performUpkeep(bytes).notice: Executes payment to the required employee using Chainlink Automation performUpkeep

transferTokensPayNative(uint64,address,a.notice: Performs a cross-chain transfer paying the fee in native token (onlyOwner)

withdraw(address).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw contract Ether balance

withdrawToken(address,address).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw ERC20 tokens from the contract
